title: QUIZ: Can you find these 9 local & lekker SA dishes?
text:
Do you know where your best bet is to find these local & lekker Saffa dishes? (Photo: iStock) YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

South Africa is a melting pot of culture, traditions, histories and, naturally, some really tasty food.

From meaty dishes to vegetarian chakalaka that bursts with flavour to worms...

WATCH: Brace your belly for a visit to LA's new Disgusting Food Museum

It's safe to say that SA has an eclectic palate and appetite.

But, like with most things, these tasty treats tend to be enjoyed a lot more in specific locations.

ALSO WATCH: Top 10 Weird and Wonderful Restaurants from around the world

Can you guess where these nine iconic local and lekker dishes are commonly found around Mzansi?

description: South Africa is a melting pot of culture, traditions, histories and, naturally, some really tasty food. Can you guess where these nine iconic local and lekker dishes are commonly found?
